nodes.text: Qista was a female Zabrak who served in the Republic Army during the Galactic War with the reconstituted Sith Empire. During the Quesh war on the planet Quesh, she was stationed at the Republic Operational Headquarters.
Qista appears in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, released by BioWare in 2011, as a Social Items Vendor for Republic players on Quesh.
